name: They Keep Coming (zhigmund)
description:
overtourism
/ˌəʊvəˈtʊərɪz(ə)m/
noun

the phenomenon whereby certain places of interest are visited by excessive numbers of tourists, causing undesirable effects for the places visited.
"Venice, Amsterdam, and Barcelona are all struggling with overtourism"

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

My take on Asteroids made during the summer course on FaVU VUT in Brno.

  • What if you could shoot only backwards?
  • What if you could move only forward?
  • What if your bullets would dissapear in a glimpse of a few moments?
  • What if they keep coming?
